text: Badminton was inducted at the Youth Olympic Games at the inaugural edition in 2010. The program included two competitions: Boys' singles and Girls' singles. The 2014 edition added a Mixed Doubles event. Players from different National Olympic Committees are allowed to participate in doubles events. ==Medal table== :As of the 2018 Summer Youth Olympics. ==Results== ===Boys' singles=== {| |- | 2010 Singapore | | | |- | 2014 Nanjing | | | |- |2018 Buenos Aires | | | |- |} ===Girls' singles=== {| |- | 2010 Singapore | | | |- | 2014 Nanjing | | | |- | 2018 Buenos Aires | | | |- |} ===Mixed=== {| |- | 2014 Nanjing | | | |- | 2018 Buenos Aires |Alpha |Omega |Theta |} ==Participating nations== {| |- |- |- |- |- |- |- |- |- |- |- |- |- |- |- |- |- |- |- |- |- |- |- |- |- |- |- |- |- |- |- |- |- |- |- |- |- |- |- |- |- |- |- |- |- |- |- |- |- |- |- |- |- |- |- |- |- |- |- |- |- |- |- |- |- |- |- |- |- |- bgcolor=lightgray |colspan=25| |- !
